remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了控制适配器可继承的通用基类。The class provides a general base class from which control adapters can inherit. 此类提供所有适配器所需的接口的默认实现。This class provides a default implementation of the interface required for all adapters. 基类的默认呈现实现应为呈现所有子控件。The default rendering implementation of the base class should be to render all child controls. 这将允许基类作为组合控件的适配器使用。This allows the base class to be used as an adapter for composition controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是接口的属性的实现, 用于获取或设置适配器所附加到的控件。 The property is an implementation of the property for the interface, which gets or sets the control to which the adapter is attached. 对于单个控件适配器, 您可以创建一个强类型属性以隐藏该属性。For individual control adapters, you can create a strongly typed property to hide the property.

Public Overridable Sub CreateTemplatedUI (doDataBind As Boolean)
abstract member CreateTemplatedUI : bool -> unit override this.CreateTemplatedUI : bool -> unit

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果为 ，则实例化的模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常发生在第一个请求中）。

span.span: If , the instantiated templates bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果为 ，则模板不会绑定到数据，而需要根据视图状态进行填充（通常在后续回发时发生）。

span.span: If , the templates do not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

summary.span: 由控件调用以创建模板化用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Called by a control to create a templated user interface (UI).

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现将调用相应的控件适配器的方法, 该方法又可以回调控件的方法或创建自己的特定于设备的模板化 UI。The default implementation calls the method of the corresponding control adapter, which can in turn call back the control's method or create its own device-specific templated UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在接收回发事件通知时由控件调用, 以检查事件是否特定于适配器。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果控件实现方法并接收回发事件 , 则会调用控件适配器的方法。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果发送到控件的事件可能因目标设备而异, 则此方法的控件实现必须调用控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回`true`或`false`, 指示设备适配器是否已处理事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 默认情况`false`下, 它返回。It returns `false` by default.

span.span: Control and Adapter Interaction

public: virtual property int ItemWeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 访问控件中某一项的大致权重。

span.span: Accesses the approximate weight of a single item in the control.

value.span: 控件中单独一项的近似权重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值-1 指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 继承类必须重写此属性。The inheriting class must override this property. 有关重写此属性的详细信息, 请参阅[分页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于窗体分页。This property is used for form pagination. 值-1 指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[分页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information, see [Pagination](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).

span.span: Pagination
